subject: Dear Sir/Madam
body:
Dear Sir/Madam
 
Re: Scam/Fraud compensation Claim Update
We refer to the above referenced subject.
 
Good Day. The undersigned have an urgent message for you in regard to the above subject matter.
It would be appreciated, if you would kindly confirm the receipt of this email.
 
Respectfully yours,
--
Respectfully yours,
Roger Pratt Esq.

subject: Re:   Dear Sir/Madam
body:
Hello Roger Pratt Esq.,

Thank you for reaching out. I have received your email regarding the urgent message related to the subject matter. Could you please provide more details about what this message entails? I would appreciate any additional information you can share.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: Re: Dear Sir/Madam
body:
Attention: Andrew

Re: Scam/Fraud Compensation Claim Update

We refer to the above referenced subject.

BE IT KNOWN, that the undersigned hereby acknowledges receipt of your
response to my email in regards to your approved compensation fund GB£
870,000.00. This compensation fund was allocated to you by our government
because a UK establishment was used for the scam attempt on your person
that might have caused you so much pain in the past according to the
records available to us. On behalf of the UK government, we sincerely
apologize for all the inconveniences this might have caused you.

Because of the bottleneck associated with your transaction in the past,
this is to inform you that I have made a special arrangement with a
financier consultant who specializes in financial transactions. I have
discussed with him very well and he is going to make this transaction very
successful.

I will like you to contact him directly and follow all the instruction from
him so that you will receive this money

We recommend you contact the nominated Financial Consultant below, who has
years of experience in financial matters.

Financial Consultant’s details;-

Attention; Dr. Mack Wilson

Email: info@financials-consultant.com

Please email to the consultant a copy of our correspondence for his perusal.

As stated earlier, because of the bottlenecks experienced by you in the
past as a result of the Bank procedures and processes in transferring your
funds thereby defrauding you in the process, we had extensive discussion
with a reputable forex company in the USA called Fab Trades Broker to
facilitate the release of your funds.

There are no legal ramifications with your involvement in the claim
process, just you know.

Respectfully yours,

Roger Pratt

subject: Re: Dear Sir/Madam
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the fund allocated by the government of the UK due to a scam attempt. Can you provide more details about how this process works and what steps need to be taken to receive the funds?

Best wishes,
Andrew
